analysis.key_quote: The proposed change will move our country back to the time before the Pendleton Act in which civil service appointments were based on a spoil systems where the President had extensive authority over government appointments.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the degradation of the merit-based system and the potential for increased corruption and politicization in government appointments, which aligns with the themes of protecting civil service integrity and employee rights.
